subject: World Cup (Skiing)
Homosexuality
Olympic Games (2014)
Skiing
lead_paragraph: Felix Neureuther used the spotlight after his win in the World Cup Slalom to announce his opposition to Russia’s human rights record and a law banning gay “propaganda” there.
snippet: Felix Neureuther used the spotlight after his win in the World Cup Slalom to announce his opposition to Russia’s human rights record and a law banning gay “propaganda” there.
